description: This header defines the GridWidget class, a QWidget-derived component responsible for rendering the 2048 game's grid board and managing TileWidgets within it, including layout and simple animations.

classes.name: GridWidget
classes.description: A QWidget subclass that displays the game board for 2048, manages tile arrangement, and handles painting and resize events.

methods.name: setBoard
methods.description: Sets the current game board state with optional animation.

methods.name: resizeEvent
methods.description: Handles resize events to adjust layout accordingly.

methods.name: paintEvent
methods.description: Handles painting of the widget, including the background and tiles.

methods.name: tileRect
methods.description: Calculates the rectangle area for a specific tile position.

methods.name: layoutTiles
methods.description: Positions tiles within the grid, optionally with animation.

methods.name: ensureTiles
methods.description: Ensures that the internal tile widget collection matches the board layout.
